channel.title: PvP Server - Editing Hot Spots?
channel.description:
Alright, I'm going to make this simple and short because I want to get this fixed and done already. How do you make a safe area in a PvP source that is (Camelot PvP) or if you've never heard of that (Delta Based).
Please, somebody help me on this I haven't gotten an answer yet!
